response.explain: The error occurred because the object "table_1" was not registered before being used in the put_ontop function. The object should be registered first before being used in any function.
response.subtask:
(1) Move to the top cabinet
(2) Grasp the jar
(3) Register the table
(4) Put down the jar on the table
(5) Grasp the lid
(6) Put the lid on the jar
